name: Malfunction (itch) (DamonCapri)
description:
This game was made for the Untitled game jam #33.  I submitted early because i was busy so it was a bit rushed. Still am proud of it for my first game completed. 

99% of the artwork was from https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset 

Everything else was by me (Damon Capri)

Game: You are a robot who malfunctioned. The factory destroys malfunctioned robots, so you need to escape. Since you have malfunctioned you can only do two things at once. Now get out.
